attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
during the freedom to protest assembly this afternoon(12/01/08), brian haw (who was peacefully filming events in whitehall) was violently attacked by a territorial support group policeman who lashed out at him, smashing his camera into his face and causing a deep cut. police then arrested brian for an unspecified public order offence and further assaulted him in a police van.

above paragraph from UK Indymedia read the whole article at

http://www.indymedia.org.uk/en/2008/01/389308.html

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
